original_text: And while the children of Israel were in the wilderness, they found a man that gathered sticks upon the sabbath day.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 광야에 거류할 때에 안식일에 어떤 사람이 나무하는 것을 발견한지라

sentences.original_text: And while the children of Israel were in the wilderness
that gathered sticks upon the sabbath day
